org.springframework.test.context.transaction

Annotation Type AfterTransaction


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface AfterTransaction

    Test annotation to indicate that the annotated public void method should be executed after a transaction is ended for test methods configured to run within a transaction via the &#064;Transactional annotation.

    The &#064;AfterTransaction methods of superclasses will be executed after those of the current class.

    Since:
    2.5
    Author:
    Sam Brannen
    See Also:
    Transactional
